biography.value: A wise and respected darkling can undergo a ritual to become an elder. Other elders mark the supplicant with glowing tattoos, channeling away some of the darkling’s absorbed light. If the ritual succeeds, the darkling grows into a taller, elf-like form. The darkling perishes if the ritual fails.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

The darkling elder makes two Scimitar attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The darkling elder casts darkness, requiring no spell components and using &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} as the spellcasting ability.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Darkness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Darkness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

description.value:
Death Burn. When the darkling elder dies, magical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area must make a [[/save con 11 format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage 2d6 type=radiant average=true]] damage and is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t &Reference[blinded]{blinded}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
